Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a near triple-double with 21 points, 14 rebounds, and 9 assists in 29:45 minutes.
The Suns outscored the Nuggets by 13 points in the latter part of the game, securing a 118-114 victory.
Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets fielded their main lineup including Jokic, Jamal Murray, Michael Porter Jr., Aaron Gordon, and Christian Braun.
The Suns started Monte Morris, Royce Oâ€™Neale, Ryan Dunn, Mason Plumlee, and Bol Bol but rested their top players.
